abstract: A clock to use for output synchronization.
overview:
## Discussion

All capture output sample buffer timestamps are on the synchronization clock’s timebase. Use this clock in conjunction with the clock from an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureInput/Port] object to synchronize capture output with external data sources such as Core Motion samples.

The example below shows how to reverse synchronize the output timestamps to the original timestamps in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate/captureOutput(_:didOutput:from:)] method:

This property is key-value observable.
